T.A.T.u.:
t.A.T.u. bayibhendi kweRashiya.

Azerbaijan:

Portrait of Sir Thomas More (Holbein):
Portrait of Sir Thomas More singumdwebo nga-Hans Holbein the Younger.

Hans Holbein the Younger:
Hans Holbein the Younger (c. 1497 – uLwezi 1543) singumpendi weJalimani, ekhulunyaka 16. Igama lakhe "the Younger" ngoba ubaba lakhe uHans Holbein the Elder.

Venus and Amor:
Venus and Amor (isiga Venus and Cupid) singumdwebo c. 1524 nga-Hans Holbein the Younger, e-Öffentliche Kunstsammlung, Basel, iJalimani.

Henry Cele:
Henry Cele (; ubengumlingisi weMzansi.

Lucky Dube:
Lucky Philip Dube wabe engumculi ovelele wase Ningizimu Afrika. Wabe edume umhlaba wonke ngegalelo alibamba kumculo wohlobo lomculo we-regeyi;. Ubenza amarekhodi ama-22 esiZulu, nesiNgisi no-Afrikaans. Ubefa eRosettenville ngoMfumfu 2007.

Ermelo, Mpumalanga:
Ermelo iyinkaba wemfundo, wemboni nesikhangiso woMasipale Gert Sibande eMpumalanga. Balima (ummbila, izinkomo, amazambane, obhontshisi, ovolo, izingulube, izimbewu wojikanelanga, alfalfa/lucerne namabele). Iyimpambanamgwaqo wezindlela N2, N11 no-N17.

Rosettenville, Gauteng:
Rosettenville iyiphethelo eGoli, eningizimu wenkaba yedolobha. Igama lakhe uLeo Rosettenstein.. Izindlela zamagama womndeni.

Transvaal Province:
Isifunda weTransvaal yasifunda e-Umbuso waseNingizimu Afrika ngo-1910 - 1961, neRiphabliki yaseNingizimu Afrika, ngo-1961 - 1994.

Leonardo da Vinci:
Leonardo di ser Piero da Vinci ( ; uMbaso 15, 1452 – 2 ngoNhlaba, 1519) singumpendi, umqophi, umakhi, umdlali womculo, isazi, isazi wezibalo, unjiniyela, umqambi, isazi womzimba, isazi womhlaba, isazi wabalazwe, nosozimila.

The Vitruvian Man:
Vitruvian Man singumdwebo nga-Leonardo da Vinci.

Mona Lisa:
Mona Lisa (La Gioconda ngoba La Joconde, ngoba Portrait of Lisa Gherardini, wife of Francesco del Giocondo) singumdwebo wemfazi, nga-Leonardo da Vinci umpeni weTaliya.

The Last Supper:
The Last Supper ( ngoba "L'Ultima Cena") singumdwebo wekhulunyaka ngo-15 eMilan, iTaliya nga-Leonardo da Vinci ubemenzela inkosana uLudovico Sforza nenkosazana uBeatrice d'Este. Umbonisa indlakusihlwa igcinile ngezinsuku igcinile weVangeli woJohn 13:21, ngesikhathi uJesu ubika umkrestu uzokuchilizela.
Umdwebo.
"The Last Supper" ubukhulu 450 × 870 cm, umjika esonto Santa Maria delle Grazie eMilan, iTaliya.

Connecticut:
Connecticut iyisifunda eMelika.

Maurice Sendak:
Maurice Bernard Sendak (; 10 ngoNhlangulana 1928 – 8 ngoNhlaba 2012) umdwebi nomlobi wezincwadi zezingane weMelika. Uyaziwa ngencwadi "Where the Wild Things Are", first ubebhala ngo-1963. Sendak ubezalwa eBrooklyn, ngabazali amaPholisi uSadie (née Schindler) noPhilip Sendak, umsiki. Ubethanda izincwadi nefilimu "Fantasia" ngaWalt Disney. Sendak ubegqamile ngoba ubaloba nobedweba incwadi "Where the Wild Things Are".

Alexandra, Gauteng:
Alexandra isiga "Alex" no-"Gomora" iyilokishi eGoli.
Imidlalo.
Iqembu webhola Alexandra United.
Abantu.
Lezi zizakhamuzi eziphawulekayo zase-Alexandra:

Mahlathini:
Simon 'Mahlathini' Nkabinde (1938 - 27 ngoNtulikazi 1999) ngumculi "mbaqanga".

Ntando:
Ntando Bangani ngumculi weMzansi. Unerekhodi "Uhambo lwam" ngo-2007. Ubezuza ama-NnSouMusiAwards amabili ngo-2009, neculo "Dali Wami" erekhodi "Imvelaphi".
Ubezuza iSAMA ngo-2010, Best Pop Album (African): "Inqubenko."

South African Music Awards:
South African Music Awards ngo-18 (2012).
iMTN South African Music Awards yenzeka 29-30 ngoMbaso eSun City.
Omanqoba:

Thokozani Langa:
Thokozani Langa (9 ngoNhlolanja 1972 -) ubye ziwe ngelika Somnandi ngumculi wohlobo lomculo ka"Maskandi" osuka endweni yaseMahlabathini, Kwa-Zulu Natal.. Ngonyaka we-2012 kuMklomelo woMculo waseNingzimu Afrika "(SAMA)" ewinela i-alibhamu engu ngqa phambili kumculo kwaMaskandi, enesihloko esithi "I-Protection Order". 
Imisebenzi.
Ngonya wezi-2004 wasayinwa yinkampani ekhiqiza umculo ebizwa ngokututhi yi-Bula Music ukuze akhiphe i-alibhamu yakhe yesithatthu. Emva kukuqgama emsakweni wezwe kanye nasohlwelweni lomculo wesintu elabe lidlala kumabonakude alizawa ngokuthi Ezodumo, igama lakhe laqokwa kuma-"SAMA" ngonyaka wezi-2013. Lapha wabe eqokelwe kwisigaba se-alibhamu engu ngqa phambili kuMasikandi kanye nengu ngqa phambili kuMbaqanga. Lapha wabe eqokelwe amalibhamu akhe womabili okuyilawa, "Iphepha Nepeni" (2005) kanye nethi "Lishonil' Ilanga" (2006). Kulesigaba wabe eqhathwe neqembu lombaqanga i-Soul Brothers kanye noBhekumuzi Luthuli . 
OkaLanaga wake wabe sembangweni nomunye nomculi kamsakandi uBhekumuzi Luthuli. Ukungathelelani amanzi kwabo kwaze kwaholela ekutheni uLanga akhiphe i-alibhamu eyabe inesihloko esithi "Phuma Kimi" (2007). Le-alibhamu yanqoba kuMklomelo woMculo weSintu waseNingizimu Afrika kuMandulo ngonyaka wezi-2007, izizwa kwisigabe seCiko leSilisa elihamba phambili. 

Pietà (Michelangelo):
Pietà ngumfuziselo wobuciko owakhiwa nguMichelangelo Buonarroti oseSt. Peter's Basilica Edolobheni laseVethikheni ezweni laseRoma. 

David (Michelangelo):

Michelangelo:
Michelangelo di Lodovico Buonarroti Simoni (6 ngoNdasa 1475 – 18 ngoNhlolanja 1564), isiga Michelangelo ().

Brett Murray:
Brett Murray (ubezalwa ngo-1961) ubependa umdwebo "The Spear".

Wayne Coyne:
Wayne Michael Coyne (ubezalwa 13 ngoMasingane 1961).

Ayanda Mabulu:
Ayanda Mabulu (ubezalwa ngo-1981) ngumpendi baseNingizimu Afrika. Lompendi waziwa ngokudweba umdwebo owasusa umsindo ngonyaka we-2010, ayewiqambe ngokuthi "Ngcono ihlwempu kunesibhanxa sesityebi". Lodwebo uveza abaholi kanye nosombuswazwe bamazwe ahlukahlukene benqunu. Lodwebi esezidonsele amanzi ngomsele ngodweba eminye imidwebo emingi lapho eveza khona osombusazwe baseNingizimu Afrika bequnu. 

The Spear (umdwebo):
The Spear singumbdwebo nga-Brett Murray.

Pablo Picasso:
Pablo Diego José Francisco de Paula Juan Nepomuceno María de los Remedios Cipriano de la Santísima Trinidad Ruiz y Picasso, isiga sakhe nguPablo Picasso (, singumpendi ubehlala eFulansi.

Henri Rousseau:
Henri Julien Félix Rousseau () ngumpende weFulansi.

The Sleeping Gypsy:
The Sleeping Gypsy singumdwebo nga-Henri Rousseau.

Tiger in a Tropical Storm:
Tiger in a Tropical Storm noma Surprised! (isiFulansi "Tigre dans une tempête tropicale" or "surpris!") ngumdwebo odwetshwe ngumpendi uHenri Rousseau. Lona ngumdwebo wokuqala lapho igama lompendi laziwa khona. Lodwebo uveza ithayiga ikhanyiswa ngumbani lapho izingela khona ehlathini. 

Nadine Gordimer:
Nadine Gordimer (20 ngoLwezi 1923 — 13 ngoNtulikazi 2014) wayengumlobi waseNingizimu Afrika ngolimi lwesiNgisi. Wathola imiklomelo Booker (1974) no-iNobel Prize besimibhalo (1999).

Siphiwe Mkhonza:
Siphiwe Ignatius Mkhonza (ubezalwa 25 ngoMfumfu 1979) ngumdlali webhola weqembu i-Black Leopards F.C. kanye neqembu lesizwe i-Bafana Bafana.

Lucas Sithole:
Lucas Sithole (15 ngoLwezi 1931 - 8 ngoNhlaba 1994) ngumqophi waseNingizimu Afrika. Sithole umsebenzi wakhe wawuyizinkuni zomdabu, kanye nezithombe zakhe zethusi, itshe nezinye izinto. 

IKiyevi:
iKiyevi isiqongo saseYukreyini.

Avril Lavigne:
uAvril Lavigne unguhlabeleli eKhanada.

Ladysmith Black Mambazo:
Ladysmith Black Mambazo yiqembu lomculo laseRiphabliki yaseNingizimu Afrika elicula uhlobo lomculo wesicathamiya. 

Oscar Pistorius:
Oscar Leonard Carl Pistorius (ubezalwa 22 ngoLwezi 1986), umgijimi usebenzisa i-"prosthetics" waseNingizimu Afrika.

Motorhead:
Motörhead bayibhendi kwOmbuso Ohlangeneyo.

Usain Bolt:
The Honourable Usain St. Leo Bolt, OJ, C.D. (; owazalwa 21 ngoNcwaba 1986) umgijimi baseJamaica. 

Inyama:
Inyama ukudla okuvela esilwaneni. Jikelele lokhu kusho imisipha yomzimba kuhlananisa namafutha awo.

Robert Mugabe:
Robert Gabriel Mugabe (21 ngoNhlolanja 1924 - 6 ngoMandulo 2019) ngumongameli wangaphambilini wase-Zimbabwe. Wabe engumholi walelizwe isikhundla iminyaka engama-37 (1980-2017). Washiya esikhundleni sakhe sobumongameli mhla zingama-21 Lwezi we-2017 emva kukuba sesihlalweni kusukela mhla zingama-31 kuZibandlela we-1987. Wayephinde abe ngumholi leqembu lozombuswe elibusayo i-ZANU-PF.

IBaria:
IBaria (isiViyetnami: "Bà Rịa") inhlokodolobha Baria-Vungtau yaseViyetnami.

INhatrang:
INhatrang (isiViyetnami: "Nha Trang") inhlokodolobha Khanh Hoa yaseViyetnami.
Nha Trang - Wikivoyage

Savuka:
Savuka iyibhendi idala ngo-1986 ngo-Johnny Clegg. 

Fernanda Vasconcellos:
Fernanda de Vasconcellos Galvez waziwa kakhulu ngelikaFernanda Vasconcellos (14 ngoMandulo 1984) ungumlingisi waseBhrazili. Wazlelwa edolobheni laseSão Paulo, khona eBhrazili. 

Henri Castelli:
Henri Lincoln Fernandes Nascimento (10 ngoNhlolanja 1978) ungumlingisi waseBhrazili.

Edson Celulari:
Edson Francisco Celulari (20 ngoNdasa 1958) ungumlingisi waseBhrazili.

Cláudia Raia:
Maria Cláudia Motta Raia (23 ngoZibandlela 1966) ungumlingisi waseBhrazili.

University Niccolò Cusano:
University Niccolò Cusano ("Università degli Studi Niccolò Cusano" - UNICUSANO) iyinyuvesi eRome, ITaliya.

Chicago:
Chicago iyidolobha eIllinois. I-Chicago idolobha lesithathu elinabantu abaningi kakhulu e-United States, kanti lesibili sivakashelwe ngabokufika. Emagqumeni aseLake Michigan, iChicago yaqala ukukhula ngekhulu le-19. Umlilo Omkhulu waseChicago wase-1871 washiya abaningi abangenamakhaya, kodwa abantu baseChicago bavuselela kabusha, bathuthukisa izitayela zokwakha ezintsha ezifana ne-skyscraper ensimbi enezinsimbi. Kwabaningi, i-Chicago yikhungo sezokuxhumana, ezezimali, imboni nezinye izinto eziningi ezifanayo. Isikhumulo sezindiza sawo wonke umhlaba singenye yezwe elibi kakhulu futhi linomnotho ohlukene kakhulu futhi olinganiselayo. Ezinye izimpawu zomgwaqo zihlanganisa i-Sears Tower ne-Millennium Park. Kubuye nasekhaya le-University of Chicago. Idolobha likhule kahle, lihlaziye, ubuciko, i-theatre nomculo (ikakhulukazi i-jazz nomculo we-elektroniki). I-Chicago inamaqembu amaningi wezemidlalo wezemidlalo, kuhlanganise namathimba amabili ebhola.

Colorado:
Colorado iyisifunda eMelika.

Utah:
Utah iyisifunda eMelika.

California:
California iyisifunda eMelika.

Arizona:
Arizona iyisifunda eMelika.

Lady Gaga:
Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta ("Lady Gaga", owazalwa 28 ngoNdasa 1986) unguhlabeleli eMelika.

Isikole samabanga aphezulu eMeadowlands:
Isikole samabanga aphezulu eMeadowlands (futhi siphinde sibizwe ngokuthi i Ndofaya) siyisikolo sombuso sebanga elikhulu eMeadowlands kwi sigaba saseSoweto. lesi esinye sezikolo esacalwa e Meadowlands ngemuva kokukhishwa kwabantu ngesihluku eSophiatown.

Justin Bieber:
Justin Drew Bieber (owazalwa 1 ngoNdasa 1994) ungumculi waseMelika.

Idaho:
Idaho iyisifunda eMelika.

Marjorie Estiano:
Marjorie Dias de Oliveira (owezalwa 1982) unguhlabeleli IBrazili.

Indlu ye Satyagraha:
Indlu Ye Satyagraha, eyaziwa njengendlu ka Gandhi, itholakala engxenyeni yase Johannesburg. Lendlu ilapho u Mahatma Gandhi ayehlala khona waphinde wasebenzela khona phakathi kweminyaka yabo 1908 kuya ku 1909. yaziwa njenge ndawo yamagugu nobuciko.lendlu beyinendawo yokudlala umphebezo kanye nesibaya sama Hhashi kodwa uGhandi kanye no Kallenbach babengaphili impilo yezigwili baguqula indlu bayenza indawo ebebazophila impilo elula.
uGhandi wayelala kwindawo ebingasenhla lapho begibela khona ngomzila wendlu , ngenca ka Ghandi impilo ka Kallenbach yaba noshintjo olukhulu, bobabili babengadingi imali eningi ukwanelisa izidingo nqanti zabo .indlu bayishiya ngo 1909 yathengwa abantu abaningi ngaphambi kokuthengwa yinkampani yezokuvakasha yase France ebizwa ngokuthi I Voyaguers du Monde , eyabese iyayiguqula iyenza indawo yamasiko neyokulala kanye neyabavakashi Khona manje lendlu inakekelwa u Lauren Segal , onolwazi olunzulu ekunakekelweni kwezindlo zamasiko kanye nezabavakashi , ukulwa ngaphandle kodlame okunye lendlu emele kona eNingizimu ne Afrika
Umlando.
Ngo 1904 u Ghandi wahlangana no makhi wezindlu u Hermann Kallenbach owayeyi Juda laseJalimani, wamakhela lendlu ayenza ayisusela esibayeni sezinkomo, kungakho ibizwa ngokuthi isibaya (kraal).
Ezokuvakasha.
Lendlu ithola izivakashi eziningi ngonyaka, ezinye zalezo zivakashi yizizukulwane zikaGhandi uEla Ghandhi, noTara Ghandi ngonyaka ka2014. 

Paramore:
Paramore bayibhendi kwUSA.

John Cale:
John Davies Cale, OBE (ubezalwa 9 ngoNdasa 1942), ungumculi waseWelisi, umqambi, umculi, umbhali wengoma nomkhiqizi womculo, futhi ngumdlali ngebhendi The Velvet Underground.

The Velvet Underground:
The Velvet Underground bayibhendi kwIMelika. Iqembu laqala eNew York (idolobha) ngo-1964. Kwakukhona abaculi abane kuleli qembu: Lou Reed (umculi, isiginci), John Cale (Udlala izinsimbi eziningi zomculo), Sterling Morrison (isiginci), and Angus MacLise (amadubhu; washintshwa nguMoe Tucker ngo-1965).

Lou Reed:
Lewis Allen "Lou" Reed (02 ngoNdasa 1942 - 27 ngoMfumfu 2013) ngumdlali ngebhendi The Velvet Underground.

Duduza:
Duduza iyidolobha eGauteng.

Angus MacLise:
Angus MacLise ngumdlali ngebhendi The Velvet Underground.

Isiphethu:
Isiphethu amanzi aqhuma phansi komhlaba endaweni evundile.

Ukhandashisa:
Ukhandashisa 'ukhandalimtshelokwakhe' umuntu ogxajelwa yikhanda ohlale ephambana nezinto. Umuntu ongaleli uma etshelwa kodwa ovele enze okwakhe okuhlukile, imvamisa okunganambithiseki.
Ukwakheka kwegama: ikhanda (ibizo) + shisa (isenzo)

UNongoloza:
UNongoloza umuntu owaduma ngokusungula iqembu lemigulukudu elalibizwa ngamaNiniva. Uphinde aziwe njengomuntu owaqala imithetho eyakhiwa yizigebengu emajele ebizwa 'ngenombolo'. Umlando kaNongoloza utholakala kakhulu uma uxoxa nama-bhantinti aboshwa iminyaka. 
Omunye owaduma kanye noNongoloza uNgelekejane. UNongoloza noNgelekejane babehlangene eqenjini lemigulukudu elagcina lihlukane phakathi. Amaqembu abo babewabiza ngama-27 (ezikaNgelekejane) nama-28 (ezikaNongoloza)

UNgelekejane:
uNgelekejane umholi weqembu lemigulukudu lasejele elizibiza ngama-27. Leli qembu lasungulwa ngemuva kokuhlukana phakathi weqembu lemigulukudu likaNguluguthu(27)/Pomabasa(28) ngokomlando okunguyena 'owaqasha' uNongoloza noNgelekejane.
See :en:The Numbers Gang

Ingqalabutho:
Ingqalabutho (umqali webutho/ibutho lokuqala) umuntu owaduma okokuqala entweni ethile ayenzayo, kungaba umdlalo, impi noma ikhono elithile elikhethekile. Leli gama lijwayele ukuphaqhathaniswa negama ‘iqhawe’.

Ibhantinti:
Ibhantinti umuntu obuya ejele, oboshiwe noma oseke waboshwa isikhathi eside imvamisa owazi ukusuka nokuhlala ngejele.

Imvulamlomo:
Imvulamlomo inkomo ekhokhwa phambili uma kulotsholwa ekhokhelwa ukuba abasekhweni/uyise wentombazane elotsholwayo avule umlomo ukuze kuqale izingxoxo. Le nkomo kuvame ukuthi kube yimali ethile okungaba ngopondo abahlanu kuya phezulu kodwa akuvamile ukweqa ekhulwini lamarandi. Kusadliwa ngoludala bekuba yinkomo uqobo lwayo eqhutshwa ngabafana.

Undabazabantu:
Undabazabantu igama elalisetshenziswa kabili. Okokuqala lalisho amahhovisi kahulumeni lapho abantu kwakudingeka baye khona beyokhokha okhandapondo futhi beyobalwa benze nodomupasi. 
Leli gama laliphinde lisho isithunywa somlungu esasesatshwa kwaZulu esasehla senyuka ngehhashi sihambisa imiyalezo kahulumeni emphakathini siqoqa nokhandapondo. Yiso lesi sithunywa esasihambe singena umuzi nomuzi sibuza izindaba zabantu sithi sithunywe uhulumeni. Empeleni igama elithi "ndabazabantu" lalisho ukuthi "uhulumeni"
Namhlanje igama undabazabantu lisetshenziswa ukuchaza uphiko lakwa-"Human Resorces" ezinkampanini nesazihlanganweni naseminyangweni. 
Leli gama like lasetshenziswa ukuchaza umnyango wakwa-Home Affairs ngenxa yokuthi ngezikhathi zakudala lo mnyango ubuhlangene neminyango efana nowokuqoqwa kwentela, ukubalwa komphakathi, amapasi njll. Manje lo mnyango usubizwa ngoUMnyango wezaseKhaya.

University Guglielmo Marconi:
University Guglielmo Marconi ("Università degli Studi Guglielmo Marconi") iyinyuvesi eRome, ITaliya.

Agnes Monica:
u-Agnes Monica Muljoto (1 kuNtulikazi 1986) owaziwa ngegama lakhe lasesiteji elithi "Agnez Mo" ungumculi, umbhali-zingoma aphinde abe ngumlingisi wase-INdoneshiya.

C. C. Catch:
C. C. Catch (Caroline Catharina Müller; owazalwa 31 ngoNtulikazi 1964, i-Oss, iNetherlands) unguhlabeleli eJalimani.
<br>

Mirazh:
«Mirazh» («Мираж») iyibhendi kweRashiya (1986—).

Phunga kaGumede:
Phunga kaGumede (?—1727) ungunkosi wamaZulu.

Vladimir Putin:
Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin (/ˈpuːtɪn/; Russian: Влади́мир Влади́мирович Пу́тин, IPA: vɫɐˈdʲimʲɪrəvʲɪtɕ ˈputʲɪn; 7 ngoMfumfu 1952) ngumongameli wezolo weRashiya ("2000—2008" & "2012—").

Selena Gomez:
Selena Gómez (owazalwa 22 ngoNtulikazi 1992) unguhlabeleli eMelika.

Shakira:
Shakira unguhlabeleli IKolombiya.

Bruce Hubbard:
Bruce Hubbard (1952 - 12 ngoLwezi 1991) unguhlabeleli eMelika.

Wyoming:
Wyoming iyisifunda eMelika. Isiqongo Cheyenne.

Caselle Landi:
Caselle Landi, idolobha lase ITaliya.

Vladimir Lenin:
Vladimir Lenin (Владимир Ильич Ленин, 22 ngoMbasa 1870 – 21 ngoMasingane 1924) ngumholi wokuqala weSoviet Union.

Joseph Stalin:
Joseph Stalin (Ио́сиф Виссарио́нович Ста́лин, 18 ngoZibendlela 1878 – 5 ngoNdasa 1953) ngumholi weSoviet Union.

Queen:
Queen bayibhendi kwOmbuso Ohlangeneyo.

Freddie Mercury:
uFreddie Mercury (owazalwa Farrokh Bulsara; Gujarati: ફરોખ બલ્સારા‌, Pharōkh Balsārā‌; 5 ngoMandulo 1946 – 24 ngoLwezi 1991 ) ngumdlali ngebhendi Queen.

IsiSwazi:
IsiSwazi singulimi eNingizimu Afrika.

Castel Goffredo:
Castel Goffredo, idolobha lase ITaliya.

Marek Grechuta:
Marek Michał Grechuta (10 ngoZibandlela 1945 — 9 ngoMandulo 2006), Pholisi umculi, imbongi umpendi. Ngo-1966 yena wasungula iqembu Anawa. Izingoma zakhe aziwa kakhulu: "Niepewność", "Dni których nie znamy", "Korowód".

Izikhothane:
Izikhothane (Skothane noma ukuKhothana) yigama lesisZulu elamaqembu abantu abavame ukutholaka emalokishini ase Ningizimu Africa abathanda ukuzibonakalisa ngokomnotho wabo phambi kwabantu. Embuthanweni efana neye mingcwabo, imishado noma emicimbini ethize ehlelwe yizona Izikhothane, la okwenziwa imincintiswano yokubonakalisa iminotho yazo lezo Izikhothane. Iminotho lena kusuke ku ngama cellphone, imali, izimpahla noma ugologo . Isikhothane esingene kulo mncintiswano singathatha izicathulo zaso ezibizayo siziphonsele emlilweni . Leso Sikhothane siyobe sikhombisa ukuthi asinandaba nazo lezo zicathulo ngoba phela sona sinemali singathenga ezinye ezifanayo noma ezibiza okudlula lezi esezishisiwe. Isikhothane singathatha iwashi laso elibizayo kakhulu siliphihlizele phansi. Izikhothane eziphumelela kulomncintiswano yilezo ezine zinto eziningi ezibizayo zokumosha.
Umdabuko.
Igama elithi izikhothane liqhamuka emagameni amabili esiZulu : ukukhotha nokukhothana. Yigama lase lokishini elichaza umuntu onezimpahla ezibizayo. Igama lokukhotha lisentshenziswa Ngoba umuntu onenqwaba yemali ukhotha umunwe wakhe ukuze ayibale kahle imali yakhe. Emicimbini yezikhothane abanye beza ne “desert custard” (iyabiza) bese bezininda ngayo, bezama ukukhombisa ukuthi bane mali eningi.
Saqala ukuzwa ngezikhothane ekuqaleni kuka 2000 elokishini lase Sowetho nase Diepsloot eNingizimu Africa. kwaphela iminyaka eminingi abantu bengayinaki imicimbi yezikhothane. Izikhothane ziqale ukuduma kakhulu ngonyaka ka 2011 kusiyaphambili. 
Izenzo Zezikhothane zikhumbuza iningi labantu baseningizimu Africa amaSwenka ayedume kakhulu ngeminyaka yabo 1950’s eGoli. Amaswenka kwakungabantu ababe vela ezindaweni ezihlukahlukene belande ukuzosebenza eGoli. Babethanda ukuqgoka izimpahla ezibizayo, beqgoka kahle impela. Babenokuhlela imincintiswano yokuthi kutholakale ukuthi ngubani owayeqgoka kahle ukudlula abanye. Owaye nqoba kulemincintiswano yokuqgoka kahle waye nikwa imali, izimphahla noma imfuyo. Ayejabula amaswenka ma ewinile Ngoba ayesengakwazi nokuthumela umndeni wakhe imali.
Izenzo zezikhothane.
Izikhothane zizalwa ebumpofini. Zithanda ukuphila impilo engaphezukwe mali ezinayo. Zithenga izinto ezidulayo ziyiqede yonke imali yazo. Ziqgoka izimpahla ezenziwa ngamaDesigners adumile. Nogologo eziwuphuzayo yilo obiza kakhulu. Kulemicimbi yabo bayaziphula nomabadabule izimpahla zabo ezibizayo ukuze babukeke njengabantu abanothile abanemali. Ngaleyo ndlela bayahlonipheka emphakathini.
uKuze ubizwe njenge Sikhothane kufanele ubenezimpahla ezibizayo ezama “brand”. Izikhothane zinokuthenga izimpahla ezifanayo ezibizayo ukuze zizokwazi ukudabula enye yalezompahla ngesikhathi somcimbi. Ziyaye zibuye ziqgoke izicathulo ezinombala ohlukile kunesinye. Lokhu kukhomba ukuthi banayo imali njalo banazo izicathulo ezibizayo eziningi. Mabethenge impahla abayikhiphi i “price tag” ukuze kubonakele ukuthi iyabiza leyo mpahla.
Izimpi ZeziKhothane.
Injongo.
Injongo yomcimbi wezikhothane yikuthi kubonakale ukuthi ngubani onomnotho odlula owabanye. Awukho Umvuzo owutholawo ngokungena kulemicimbi. Izikhothane zisuke zenzela ukuthi zibonakale ukuthi zinothile zihlonishwe ngumphakathi nokuthi zithandwe ngabantu abazibukelayo.
Kuphi.
Izikhothane sezitholakala emalokishini amaningi kiyoyonke iNingizimu Africa jikeleze. Lemicimbi yenziwa ezindaweni ezinabantu abaningi ezifana nama “parks”. Lokhu kwenzelwa ukuthi abantu bakwazi ukubukela amaqembu ezikhothane ebhikisha.
Ngobani.
Intsha eneminyaka engaba phakathi kwe shumi nambili namashumi amabili nanhlanu yiyona ethanda ukungena amaqenjini ezikhothane. Amantombazane nawo aseyatholakala kulamaqembu. Okubaluleke kakhulu emaqenjini ezikhothane yikuncintisana ekumosheni izinto ezibizayo. Abamosha kakhulu kunabobonke yibona abanqobayo.
Iyenziwa Kanjani lemicimbi.
Ukuze isikhothane singene emncitiswaneni wezikhothane kumele sithenge izinto ezibizayo ezifana nezimpahla,izicathulo,ugologo nakho konke okangabe kubiza kakhulu. Izimpahla eziqgamile zikhonziwe kule mincintiswano. Oqgoke izimpahla ezibiza kunabo bonke nguye ozonqoba. Uma izikhothane sezifikile emicimbini, labo abancintisanayo babizelwa ngaphambili. Abancintisanayo basuke lapho bajayive bebukisa ngempahla yabo ebiza kakhulu. Ngesikhathi bejayiva bebukisa ngempahla zabo bazikhumula lezompahla bazidabule, badabule nemali abanayo baphule ugologo abaze nabo, nomabageze ngawo izandla zabo. Okunye kungase kushiswe ngaleso sikhathi. Macellphone labiza kakhulu aphonselwa emanzini. Konke lokhu kubonakalisa ukuthi abazinaki impahla ezibizayo ngobaziningi, nemali iningi bangathenga ezinye nomakunini. Ababukeli yibona abazosho ukuthi wubani onqobile.
Imikhuba.
Kuyacaca ukuthi Intsha ephenduka ibe yizikhothane ayilibheki kakhulu ikusasa labo. Abazimiselanga ukusebenzisa imali ngendlela efanelekile futhi emqoka. Izinto zomhlaba bazithathela phezulu. Bajahe ukuduma nokwaziwa ngamawala amakhulu. Izikhothane zona zibangwa yisifiso sokubalekela indlala ukuqhathwa ngenxayobu mpofu.

Radio Studio 54 Network:
Radio Studio 54 Network, noma Studio 54 Network, kuba into Italian radio station yangasese ezinze Locri, eCalabria. Emkhathini afinyelele Studio 54 Network on FM ezifundazweni eziyisishiyagalolunye ezindaweni ezinhlanu eningizimu ye-Italy: Messina, Reggio eCalabria, Vibo Valentia, Catanzaro, Cosenza, Crotone, Lecce, Potenza no Salerno). I izinhlelo libhekene igciwane zomculo hits kanye nokwaziswa real-time, ne 28 updates nsuku zonke.
Abasebenzi Esidlule.
Memmo Minniti, Tommaso Massara, Clementina Parretta, Enzo Gatto, Francesca Ritorto, Pino Martelli, Espedita Rechichi, Sergio Minniti, Gianluca Laganà, Rossana Pedullà, Ugo La Macchia, Paolo Guerrieri, Antonio Lombardo, Rosy Carelli, Giuseppe Galluzzo, Peppe Lentini, Paolo Guerrieri, Chiara Mearelli, Luca Filippone, Enrico Ventrice, Valentina Ammirato, Massimo Apa, Emily and Debora LoGiacco, Barbara Costa, Pasquale Fragomeni, Roberta Rupo, Veronica De Biase, Valentina Geracitano, Francesco Cunsolo, Francesco Parasporo, Antonella Romeo, Eleonora Femia, Rosana and Regina Garofalo, Debora Sainato, Ugo Lully Tommaselli, Pino Trecozzi, Luigi Grandinetti, Eddy and Ottavia Lombardo, Antony Greco, Sandro Pascuzzo, Giuseppe Evalto, Stefania Morabito.

Ngolimi lwezandla:
A lwezandla (godu wasayina kolimi noma ukumane asayine) siwulimi esebenzisa Ukukhulumisana manual kanye komzimba ukuze adlulisele incazelo, ubone acoustically wadlulisela amaphethini sound. Lokhu kungaba yinoma kanyekanye ahlanganiswe bobunjwa isandla, ukuma kanye nokunyakaza izandla, izingalo noma umgwamanda, nobuso ukuze fluidly ukuveza imicabango lesikhulumi. Bahlanganyela ezifanayo eziningi nge ezikhulunywa (ngezinye izikhathi esibizwa "izilimi ngomlomo", okusho ngokuyinhloko ixhomeke ekutheni umsindo), yingakho izazi zezilimi bacabangele kokubili ukuba abe izilimi zemvelo, kodwa kunezindlela nokungafani okukhulu phakathi izilimi esayiniwe futhi ezikhulunywa.

Abayizithulu:
Ukuzwa ukungakhuli, ukuzwa ukulahlekelwa noma izithulu, ukungakwazi ngokwengxenye noma ingqikithi ukuzwa.

Sri Lanka:
Sri Lanka iyizwe I-Eshiya.

Helena Ranaldi:
Helena Ranaldi Nogueira (24 ngoNhlaba 1966) ungumlingisi waseBhrazili.
U-Helena washada nomqondisi uRicardo Waddington owahlala naye iminyaka eyishumi wazala indodana, uPedro. Lo mbhangqwana uhlukaniswe ngoJanuwari 2004.

Maitê Proença:
Maitê Proença Gallo (28 ngoMasingana 1958) umgumlingisi wase Brazili.

2013:
Bheka futhi: Unyaka ka-2013 eNingizimu Afrika "(isiNgisi)"

Vivica Rayy:
Vivica Rayy (owazalwa 19 ngoNhlaba 1983) iyi-actress waseMelika zobulili ezingcolile kanye oyisibonelo. Wa wangenela njengenhlangano actress embonini ezingcolile ngo-2005.
Vivica Rayy wazalelwa ngoINigeria. Ngo-1997 yena wathuthela Georgia, IMelika. 
Ngo-2003, lathatha JaTawny Vision Photography. Ngo-2005 yena wasungula inkampani yakhe siqu okuthiwa u Vivica Rayy Inc. Productions.

The Doors:
The Doors bayibhendi kwIMelika. Iqembu laqala eLos Angeles, California, ngo-1965. Kwakukhona abaculi abane kuleli qembu: Jim Morrison (umculi), Ray Manzarek (ikhibhodi kagesi), John Densmore (amadubhu), noRobby Krieger (isiginci).

Joan Miró:
Joan Miró i Ferrà (isiKatalani: miɾo; 20 ngoMbasa 1893 - 25 ngoZibandlela 1983) wayengumuntu umdwebi Catalan, umqophi, futhi ceramicist owazalelwa Barcelona. Kunomnyuziyamu Kunikezelwa emsebenzini wakhe, i-Fundació Joan Miró, yasungulwa ngo idolobha lakhe lokuzalwa Barcelona ngo 1975, kanti elinye, i-Fundació Pilar i Joan Miró, yasungulwa ngo idolobha yakhe yokutholwa of Palma de Mallorca ngo 1981.

Sung Jae-gi:
Sung Jae-gi (isiKhoriyani:성재기 成在基, 11 ngo-Mandulo 1967 - 26 ngo-Ntulikazi 2013), isishoshovu samalungelo abantu besilisa abavela weNingizimu Khoriya.

Chang Myon:
Chang Myon(장면 張勉, 1899 - 1966) iyimongameli (1950 - 1952, 1960 - 1961), vice president(1956 - 1960) wezolo 
weNingizimu Khoriya 

Syngman Rhee:
Syngman Rhee(이승만 李承晩, 1875 - 1965) ngumongameli wezolo weNingizimu Korea, 1948 - 1960.

Yun Bo-seon:
Yun Bo-seon(윤보선 尹潽善, 1897 - 1990) ngumongameli wezolo weNingizimu Korea, 1960 - 1962.

Heo Jeong:
Heo Jeong(허정 許政, 1896 - 1988) iyimongameli(1951, 1960), ngumongameli wezolo weNingizimu Korea, 1960.

U2:
U2 bayibhendi kwI-Ayilendi.

IHarare:
IHarare obizwa ngokomthetho ngokuthi eSalisbury kuze-1982) yisona enhlokodolobha yaseZimbabwe.

Wikimedia Commons:
Wikimedia Commons (noma bamane Commons) iyi-online Igumbi of free-ukusetshenziswa imifanekiso, umsindo, nezinye amafayela abezindaba. Kuyindlela project of the Wikimedia Foundation.
Amafayela ezivela Wikimedia Commons ungasetshenziswa kuzo zonke amaprojekthi Wikimedia kuzo zonke izilimi, kuhlanganise Wikipedia, Wikibooks, Wikivoyage, Wikispecies, Wikisource no Wikinews noma ilandelwe ukusetshenziswa offsite. Onalo iqukethe amafayela kuka million 21 abezindaba. Ngo July 2013, inani edits on Commons kwafinyelela 100,000,000.

Lacey Duvalle:
Lacey Duvalle (owazalwa 5 ngoMbasa 1982) kuyinto i actress ezingcolile waseMelika. Yena wangena imboni omdala ifilimu ngo-2000 eneminyaka engu-18 ezizungeze kanti uvele movie kuka-150.

Nyomi Banxxx:
Nyomi Banxxx (owazalwa Amanda Dee; owezalwa 14 ngoMfumfu 1972 ) kuba radio ubuntu yaseMelika futhi sangaphambili actress ezingcolile.

Skin Diamond:
Skin Diamond (owazalwa Raylin Christensen; 18 ngoNhlolanja 1987) Isikhumba igama qophelo yaseMelika actress ezingcolile imiklomelo kanye model nude.

Leilani Leeane:
Leilani Leeane (owazalwa 1 ngoMfumfu 1992) yigama qophelo isibonelo eMelika umlingisi ezingcolile.

Marie Luv:
Marie Luv (owazalwa 1 ngoLwezi 1981) kuba i umlingisi waseMelika ezingcolile, umdansi ngaqhelekile, umfuziselo ubukhazikhazi futhi film umqondisi ezingcolile.

Mya Mason:
Mya Mason (owazalwa 4 ngoLwezi 1984) kuyinto i umlingisi ezingcolile waseMelika. Waqala inkambo yakhe emabhayisikobho ezingcolile nge-2003, enza nge-2013 kuka 60 ifilimu.

Cali Sweets:
Cali Sweets (owazalwa 9 ngoLwezi 1988) ungumlingisi wamafilimu angcolile waseMelika. Waqala inkambo yakhe emabhayisikobho ezingcolile ngonyaka we-2012.

Hydie Waters:
Hydie Waters (owazalwa 9 ngoLwezi 1987) kuyinto i umlingisi ezingcolile waseMelika. Waqala inkambo yakhe emabhayisikobho ezingcolile ngo-2007.

Steve Holmes (umlingisi ezingcolile):
Steve Holmes (owazalwa 23 uNdasa 1961) ezingcolile ifilimu umlingisi eJalimani abaqala umsebenzi wakhe ngo-1997. Holmes iyinhlangano Saxon Transylvanian owazalwa ngo Sibiu, Romania. Ngo-1968, umndeni wakhe wawela umngcele Turkish lapho iholide eBulgaria futhi wafuna ukukhoseliswa at the isikhundla German ku Istanbul.

James Deen:
Bryan Matthew Sevilla (owazalwa 7 ngoNhlolanja 1986), owaziwa kakhulu ngegama lakhe isigaba James Deen, ikhuluma leli umlingisi othandwayo James Dean, kuyinto kumdlali wasesiteji waseMelika zobulili ezingcolile kanye nomqondisi. Wangena porn imboni 2004 eneminyaka engu-18. uye yazuza ukunakekelwa ngenxa yokuntuleka wakhe zifana stereotypical abadlali zesilisa embonini ezingcolile.

Ron Jeremy:
Ronald Jeremy Hyatt (owazalwa 12 ngoNdasa 1953) waziwa ngegama esiteji Ron Jeremy, kuyinto yaseMelika omdala film umlingisi. Ngokuthi "The Hedgehog", yena waba zibalwa by AVN at number one in "The 50 Top Porn Stars of All Time" uhlu lwabo.

Internet Movie Database:
I Internet Movie Database (esifushanisiwe IMDb) kuyinto uhlu inthanethi yolwazi ezihlobene amabhayisikobho, izinhlelo zethelevishini, futhi isiqophi imidlalo, ukungenisa abadlali, ukukhiqizwa crew, balingisi eqanjiwe, Umlandvomphilo, icebo emathebula, futhi okubalulekile. Izıhlabane kanye nezisebenzi besho bechaza ulwazi lomsebenzi wabo siqu futhi ulayishe izithombe yodwa imali unyaka ngamunye. Abasebenzisi be US angenza futhi babheke movie kuka 6.000 no zethelevishini abavela CBS, Sony, futhi ezimele ifilimu bakaleyisi ehlukahlukene.
Umkhankaso ngo-1990 ngu-professional computer Unicode Col Needham, inkampani sifakwa kwi-UK njengoba Internet Movie Database Ltd ngo 1996, nge imali ekhiqizwa ngokusebenzisa nokukhangisa, kwamalayisense, futhi ukubambisana. Ngo-1998, yaba osizayo of Amazon.com, ababezimisele ke bakwazi ukuyisebenzisa njengesilwane mthombo advertising ngokudayisa DVD kanye videotapes.

Internet Adult Film Database:
I Internet Adult Film Database (IAFD) kuyinto uhlu inthanethi kwemininingwane ephathelene, eMelika, imboni Izithombe ezingcolile: abadlali, abadlali, abaqondisi kanye namafilimu ezingcolile. Kuyinto efanayo ku-Database Movie Inthanethi, ngoba livulekele emphakathini futhi zisesheke. Amafilimu enziwa embonini ezingcolile non-American kutholakala kuyi database uma ukukhululwa US iyatholakala kanti ifilimu elithintekayo uvezwa njengoba lokuphatha ulwazi mayelana ukukhululwa US, hhayi kulowo original.
I eyandulela kuya IAFD kwaba i-imeyili-no FTP-kufinyeleleke database lalabadzala ifilimu Abadlali esibizwa Abserver ezazishiwo owadalwa Dan Abend ngo 1993.

Adult Film Database:
I Adult Film Database iyi-website okuzama ukugcina amarekhodi azo zonke movie ezingcolile kanye omdala amafilimu izinkanyezi. Lokhu kuhlanganisa filmographies, Umlandvomphilo ngokwengxenye, ukubuyekezwa, abhalwe futhi Page omdala ifilimu stills, kanye olusha njalo imboni omdala blog okuyinto izici izindaba zakamuva mayelana lomculo esekhulile, amabhayisikobho, abaqondisi, studios, web site updates and izindaba omdala ahlukahlukene emhlabeni jikelele.
It ekuqaleni wadalwa 1991 ngaphansi kwegama le Sodomite by umfundi ekolishi. Lokhu kwaba Ezama igebe we engekho okwesikhashana i-Database Internet Adult Film and njengendlela project in ukuthuthukiswa web. Ngo-1999 igama lalo lashintshwa the AdultFilmDatabase.com. Namuhla, i-AdultFilmDatabase.com kuba nathi enkulu i-Database Inthanethi Adult Film.

Himno Nacional de Chile iculo lesizwe lasezweni laseTshile.

ITshile:
ITshile ("República de Chile") iyizwe eMelika Eningizimu. IsiQongo saseTshile ISantiago ("Santiago de Chile"). Ulimi isiSpeyini. 

Coco Brown:
Coco Brown (ubezalwa 16 ngoMandulo 1978) kuyinto i umlingisi ezingcolile waseMelika (1998-2003). Waqala inkambo yakhe emabhayisikobho ezingcolile ngo-1998.

XVideos:
XVideos iyi-mahhala ividiyo ukwabelana website. Kuyinto ethandwa kakhulu website izithombe ezingcolile zonke emhlabeni, njengoba ayeke okunqoba Pornhub njengoba iningi popular omdala video ukwabelana website ngoLwezi 2010. Iphinde kwanyatheliswa LiveJasmin, i-website yabantu abadala yevidiyo ngoMasingana 2012.
Ngokusho Alexa bekulokhu omunye kumawebhusayithi 50 ethandwa kakhulu kuyi-Internet kusukela ekuqaleni kuka 2013, kanti Njengamanje izivakashi nyangazonke ezigidini 350, ukuhlinzeka "ama-29 petabytes yedatha adlulisiwe njalo ngenyanga."

Pornhub:

Malebogo Marumoagae:
Malebogo Marumogae (owazalwa 1983) is a indlovukazi ubuhle ababemelela IButswana eMiss World 2007 eChina. Marumoagae iziqu enyuvesi ne degree a impohlo sika kwezomnotho kanye labantu izifundo.

Emma Wareus:
Emma Wareus (owazalwa 28 ngoNtulikazi 1990 ngoGaborone) iyinhlangano indlovukazi ubuhle kusuka IButswana owabeka lokuqala umgijimi-up kuya Miss World 2010 mhlaka 30 ngoMfumfu 2010 ku Sanya, China. Lona ukubekwa ophakeme kunayo ngokuba owesifazane kusuka lakubo emlandweni we pageant. Futhi nokubekwa esiphezulu a IButswana ubuhle indlovukazi kusukela Mpule Kwelagobe won Miss Universe 1999. Ethola iziqu Rainbow High School ngo-2008.

Tatum Keshwar:
Tatum Keshwar (owazalwa 14 ngoZibandlela 1983, eThekwini) iyinhlangano fashion model South African of Indian imvelaphi ngubani egcotshwa Miss South Africa 2008 mhlaka 15 ngoZibendlela 2008.

Imani Rose:
Imani Rose (owazalwa 8 ngoNtulikazi 1986 ku Hayward, California) kuyinto i actress ezingcolile waseMelika. Yena wangena imboni omdala ifilimu ngo-2009 eneminyaka engu-23.

Eve Mayfair:
Eve Mayfair (owazalwa 21 ngoMasingane 1980 ku San Francisco, California) kuyinto i actress ezingcolile waseMelika. Yena wangena imboni omdala ifilimu ngo-2005 eneminyaka engu-25.

Jenna Brooks:
Jenna Brooks (owazalwa 16 ngoMbasa 1983, kuLos Angeles, California) kuyinto i actress ezingcolile waseMelika. Yena wangena imboni omdala ifilimu ngo-2001 eneminyaka engu-18.

Tiffany Mason:
Tiffany Mason (owazalwa 20 ngoMasingane 1982 ePhoenix, Arizona) kuyinto i-actress ezingcolile waseMelika. Yena wangena imboni omdala ifilimu ngo-2000 eneminyaka engu-18.

Pierre Woodman:
Pierre Woodman (owazalwa 29 ngoMbasa 1963 ku Auvergne, iFulansi) kuyinto ifilimu umqondisi ezingcolile. Nguye uMdali kuka 65 ifilimu ezingcolile, ezingaphezu kuka 2 000 izigcawu hardcore babalelwa 1,500 photosets futhi kuka 7.000 castings.

Pornopedia:
Pornopedia iyinhlangano website wiki ngezithombe ezingcolile, erotica, ubulili kanye konke okuhlobene kuso okubalwa abadlali, abaqondisi, amabhayisikobho, izincwadi kanye amathoyizi.
Pornopedia kuyinto anabanikazi sa Till Kraemer, nomdlali German, TV aphethe ne bangaphambili ezingcolile ifilimu umlingisi.

Till Kraemer:
Till Kraemer (owazalwa 18 ngoNcwaba 1977 ngo Bonn-Bad Godesberg, IJalimani), kuyinto nomdlali German, owayeyinhloko umlingisi ezingcolile, umlobeli, ithelevishini aphethe, Trance DJ kanye ifilimu umhlaziyi. He uyagijima Pornopedia, i-encyclopedia online ngezithombe ezingcolile, erotica kanye nezocansi.

Monica Foster:
Monica Foster (owazalwa 7 ngoMasingane 1979, ku Kirkland, Washington) kuyinto i actress ezingcolile waseMelika. Yena wangena imboni omdala ifilimu ngo-2008 eneminyaka engu-29.

Stacey Cash:
Stacey Cash (owazalwa 9 ngoNhlangula 1980, ku California) kuyinto i actress ezingcolile waseMelika. Yena wangena imboni omdala ifilimu ngo-2001 eneminyaka engu-21.

Rhianna Ryan:
Rhianna Ryan (owazalwa 5 ngoMbasa 1990) kuyinto i actress ezingcolile waseMelika. Yena wangena imboni omdala ifilimu ngo-2009 eneminyaka engu-19.

Tshegofatso Seakgoe:
Tshegofatso Seakgoe (owazalwa 8 ngoNdasa 1990 ku Inkwenkwezi, eSoweto) indlela Ningizimu Afrika kanye wezokuzilibazisa. Wazalwa ngo Inkwenkwezi, eSoweto eNingizimu Afrika. Seakgoe wafika Umsebenzi wakhe wokuqala ezinkulu ayezenza for Playboy Magazine, Ningizimu Afrika ngoNhlaba 2011. Wayengunkosikazi owawina umncintiswano imodeli-Photography run by Elle Magazine Ningizimu Afrika ngo-2010.

Liya Kebede:
Liya Kebede (owezalwa 1 ngoNdasa 1978) kuyinto isibonelo umTopiya kuzalwa, omama ezempilo advocate.

Hinako Sano:
Hinako Sano "(IsiJaphani:" 佐野ひなこ (さの ひなこ); 13 uMfumfu 1994, Tokyo) umlingisi baseJaphani.

Alexa Internet:
Alexa Internet, Inc iyinhlangano ezinze eKhalifoniya company osizayo we Amazon.com enikeza commercial idatha web sezimoto. Osekelwe njengoba inkampani ezimele ngo-1996, kwaba Alexa zitholwa Amazon ngo-1999. Yamathuluzi Its eqoqa idatha ukuphequlula ukuziphatha futhi adlulisele lona website Alexa, lapho egcinwe nokuhlaziwa, ukwakha isisekelo web traffic yokubika wenkampani. Ngokusho website yayo, njengoba ka-2014, Alexa inikeza idatha omgwaqo, rankings yonke futhi neminye ulwazi website ayizigidi 30, kanye website yayo evakashela abantu abangaphezu kwezigidi 8.8 njalo ngenyanga.

Amazon.com:
Amazon.com, Inc / æməzɒn / kuyinto inkampani i ezentengiselwano electronic nendlunkulu eSeattle, Washington, Izifunda Ohlangeneyo seMelika. Kuyinto umthengisi online kunayo yonke emhlabeni. Amazon.com waqala njengenhlangano Bookstore Online, kodwa ngokushesha lomnotho, DVD ukuthengisa, VHSs, CD, video kanye MP3 Downloads / yokusakaza, isofthiwe, isiqophi imidlalo, electronics , isembatho, ifenisha, ukudla, amathoyizi, ne zokuhloba. Le nkampani uveza zabathengi electronic-ikakhulukazi Hambayo Fire, Amazon Kindle e-book reader kanye tablet Kindle Fire computer-futhi umhlinzeki enkulu kwemisebenzi ngamafu.

Isifo segciwane le-Ebola:
Isifo segciwane le-Ebola (EVD) or Imfiva Ye-Ebola eyophisayo (EHF) yisifo esihlasela abantu ngegciwane le-Ebola. Igciwane le-Ebola. --> Izimpawu zaso zijwayele ukuqala ezinsukwini ezimbili kuya emavikini amathathu emva kokuthintana negciwane, kanye nemfiva, umphimbo obuhlungu, ubuhlungu bemisipha, kanye nekhanda elibuhlungu. --> Ngokujwayelekile isicanucanu, ukubuyisa kanye nokukhishwa yisisu kuyalandela, kanjalo nokwehla kwamandla okusebenza kwesibindi kanye nezinso. --> Lapho-ke, abanye abantu baye baqalwe yizinkinga zokopha.
Igciwane lingatholakala ngokuthinta igazi noma uketshezi lwasemzimbeni lesilwane esithelelekile (ngokujwayelekile izinkawu noma amalulwane ezithelo). Ukusabalala ngomoya akukaqoshwa kwezemvelo. Amalulwane ezithelo kukholakala ukuthi athwala aphinde asabalalise igciwane ngaphandle kokutheleleka. --> Uma abantu sebethelelekile, isifo sithathelana phakathi kwabantu ngokunjalo. --> Abesilisa abasindile basengadlulisa isifo nge sidoda isikhathi esingaba yizinyanga ezimbili. --> Ukuze kwenziwe ukuxilonga okuyikho, kuye kudingeke ukuba kuqinisekiswe ukuthi izifo ezinezimpawu ezifanayo njengo malaleveva, ikholera kanye nezinye izifo zegciwane lemfiva eyophisayo azikho. --> Ukuqinisekisa ukuxilongwa okushaya khona amasampula egazi ahlolelwa igciwane, kuhlolwe izivikelamzimba, igciwane le-RNA, noma igciwane uqobo lwalo.
Izindlela zokuvikela zibandakanya ukunciphisa ukusabalala kwesifo kusuka ezinkawini ezithelelekile kanye nezingulube kuya ebantwini. Lokhu kungenziwa ngokuhlola ukuthi izilwane ezinjengalezi azithelelekile yini zibulawe bese izidumbu zazo zingcwatshwe ngendlela uma isifo sitholakele. --> Ukupheka inyama ngendlela efanele kanye nokugqoka izimpahla zokuvikela lapho kuphathwa inyama nakho kungasiza. --> kanjalo nokugqoka izimpahla zokuvikela kanye nokugeza izandla lapho useduze nomuntu onaso isifo. --> Amasampula oketshezi lwasemzimbeni kanye nezicubu ezinesifo kufanele kuphathwe ngokuqikelela okukhulu.
Alikho ikhambi eliqondene nokwelapha lesi sifo; imizamo yokusiza abantu abathelelekile ibandakanya ingabe ukwelashwa ngokubuyiselwa amanzi emzimbeni ngokomlomo (amanzi okuphuza anoshukela nosawoti) noma uketshezi olufakwa ngamapayipi. Isifo lesi sibulala izindimbane zabantu: siye sibulale ama-50% kanye nama-90% alabo abasuke sebethelelekile ngegciwane laso. I-EVD yaqala ukubonakala e- Sudan kanye nase-Democratic Republic of Congo. --> Isifo sivame ukuba sivumbuke ezindaweni ezingakwi-equator lwe-Sub-Saharan Africa.Kusukela ngowe-1976 (lapho yabonakala khona okokuqala) kuze kube ngowezi-2013, yingcosana engaphansi kwe-1,000 yabantu abatheleleke ngonyaka. Isiga esikhulukazi sokuqubuka kwalesi sifo yilesi esiqhubekayo Ukuqubuka kwe-Ebola eNtshonalanga Afrika ngowezi-2014, nokuthinta i-Guinea, Sierra Leone, Liberia kanye-ke ne-Nigeria. Kusukela ngo-August 2014 bangaphezu kwezi-1600 abantu abatholakale nalesi sifo. Imizamo yokuthola ikhambi isaqhubeka; kodwa-ke okwamanje, alikatholakali.

Bangladesh iyizwe e-Eshiya.
